data.text: “Listen to me, all you who are in the heavens,
I wish/desire that my teaching will fall on you like rain drops
I will praise Yahweh [MTY].
He is like a rock [MET] under which we are protected;
“But you Israeli people have been very unfaithful to him;
You foolish and senseless [DOU] people,
“Think about what happened long ago;
When God, who is greater than any other god, long ago divided the people into groups,
But Yahweh decided that we would be his people;
“e saw our ancestors when they were in a desert,
Yahweh protected his people just like an eagle encourages its babies to fly
Yahweh was the only one who led them;
“After they entered the land that Yahweh promised to give to them,
The cows gave them plenty of curds/yogurt, the goats gave them plenty of milk,
“he Israeli people became rich and prosperous,
So he abandoned them because they started to worship other/strange gods.
They offered sacrifices to gods who were really demons,
They forgot the true God, the one who protects them [MET],
“hen Yahweh saw that they had abandoned him, he became angry,
He said, ‘They are very wicked/stubborn people,
They 32:21 Because they heymade me very angry because of their worshiping idols, which are not really gods;
I will be very angry, and I will destroy them
I will cause them to experience many disasters;
They will die because of being hungry and because of having hot fevers
Outside their houses, their enemies will kill them [MTY] with swords,
I wanted to scatter the Israeli people to distant countries
But if I did that, their enemies would wrongly boast
You Israelis are a nation of people who do not have any sense.
If you were wise, you would understand why you would be punished;
You would have realized why 1,000 of your soldiers would be defeated by only one of the enemy soldiers,
Your enemies know that their gods are not powerful like Yahweh, our God,
Your enemies are like [MET] grapevines planted near the ruins of Sodom and Gomorrah cities;
the wine from those grapes is like the poison of snakes [DOU].
“Yahweh says, ‘I know [RHQ] what I have planned to do to the Israeli people and to their enemies,
I am the one who will get revenge and pay those enemies back for what they have done to my people,
“But Yahweh will see that you who are truly his people, who ◄are innocent/have not done things that are wrong►,
Then Yahweh will ask his people, ‘Where are the gods
You gave to those gods the best parts of the animals that you sacrificed,
“But now you will realize that I, only I, am God;
I raise my hand toward heaven and solemnly declare
that when I sharpen my sword,
I will kill all of my enemies with a sword;
“You people of all nations, you as well as his people should praise Yahweh,
Joshua and Moses/I recited the words of that song while the Israeli people were listening.
When they/we finished reciting to the Israeli people the words of this song,
Moses/I said, “Never forget all these commands that I have been giving you today. Teach these laws to your children, in order that they will faithfully obey all of them.
These instructions are very important [LIT]. If you obey them, you will live a long time in the land that you are about to cross the Jordan River to occupy.”
On that same day, Yahweh said to Moses/me,

“Go to the Abarim Mountain range here in the Moab region, across from Jericho. Climb Nebo Mountain, and look toward the west to see Canaan land, the land that I am about to give to the Israeli people.
You will die on that mountain [EUP, DOU], like your older brother Aaron died on Hor Mountain.

You will die because both of you disobeyed me in the presence of the Israeli people, when you all were at Meribah Springs near Kadesh town in the Zin Desert. You did not honor and respect me in the presence of the Israeli people in the way that I deserve because I am God.
When you are on that mountain where I told you to go, you will see in the distance in front of you the land that I am about to give to the Israeli people, but you will not enter it.”
